item.title: Author Profiles: Yuri Tricys
item.description: Home Newsletter Author profiles Yuri tricys Profile: Yuri Tricys Little by little, a little becomes a lot. Hello, Dear Readers! My name is Yuri. I'm a freelance web developer, and the current maintainer writer/web developer for this newsletter. Web development is a fast growing field. The engineers developing browser technologies, devices, web standards, and programming languages are a busy bunch.
